Guide for using the helper function I am creating.
Open libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(testthat)
```

Start by creating a database connection to Staphopia.

```{r}
source("~/.staphopia_logon.R")
db <- staphopia_logon()
```

Pull down list of sample ids associated with the GWAS experiments we are planning. PRJNA239001 is the project id from the study of Alam et al 2014.

```{r}
P <- pull_ids(db,project = "PRJNA239001")
Q <- pull_ids(db,comments = "NARSA")
```


Set up testing
```{r}
test_file("./test_dir/test_pull_ids.R")
```



```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
